text: Miguel Angel Clemente Solano (born December 19, 1969 in Murcia) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind. He competed at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in cycling. He competed at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in cycling. He was the third person to finish in the men's visually impaired team pursuit race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:People from the Region of Murcia
